resources.string: An intelligent assistant for fruitful cultivation is a need of farming community. Design a bot that can plough, water, and plant saplings on barren lands. The Croftbot should be able to measure the pH, NPK, moisture content etc in order to provide a sundry of nutrients to make the land arable.

Kamalanathan N
